text: aur jab unhonne apana saamaan khola, to paaya ki unaka mooladhan unhen pher diya gaya hai, unhonne kahaah he hamaare pita! hamen aur kya chaahie? ye hamaara dhan, hamen pher diya gaya hai? ham apane gharaane ke lie galle (ann) laayenge aur ek oont ka bojh adhik laayenge[1], ye maap (ann) bahut thoda hai
